subject: shipping question
description_text:
Hello,
Do you have warehouses in Europe, or will purchases made on the website be shipped from outside Europe?



Best regards
Pedro Lima



Enviado do Outlook<http://aka.ms/weboutlook>

conversations.body_text: Hi Lima Jr, We have a warehouse in Germany, and all EU orders are shipped from there. Orders will only be shipped from China if the item is out of stock in Germany.Â
